title: Numbers, Time and Simple Decisions
concept: This level uses integers and real numbers in simple tasks: fractional parts, time calculations, basic comparisons and minimums. All tasks are adapted from Snakify-style beginner problems.

challenges.title: Fractional Part
challenges.description: Given a positive real number, print its fractional part (everything after the decimal point).
challenges.outputDescription: Fractional part of x as a real number.

challenges.title: First Digit After Decimal
challenges.description: Given a positive real number, print the first digit to the right of the decimal point.
challenges.outputDescription: Single digit: first digit after decimal point.

challenges.title: Car Route Days
challenges.description: A car can travel N kilometers per day. How many days are needed to cover a route of length M kilometers? Use ceiling of M/N.
challenges.inputDescription: Two positive integers N and M.

challenges.title: Digital Clock
challenges.description: Given N minutes since midnight (0 ≤ N), print the current time in hours and minutes on a 24h digital clock.
challenges.outputDescription: Two integers: hours (0–23) and minutes (0–59) separated by a space.

challenges.title: Cupcake Cost
challenges.description: A cupcake costs A dollars and B cents. Find how many dollars and cents are needed to buy N cupcakes.
challenges.outputDescription: Two integers: total dollars and total cents.

challenges.title: Hour Hand Angle
challenges.description: H hours, M minutes and S seconds have passed since midnight (0 ≤ H < 12). Determine the angle in degrees of the hour hand.
challenges.outputDescription: Real number: angle of the hour hand in degrees.

challenges.title: Minute Hand from Hour Angle
challenges.description: The hour hand has turned by α degrees since midnight. Find the angle by which the minute hand has turned since the start of the current hour.
challenges.outputDescription: Real number: angle turned by minute hand in degrees.

challenges.title: Smaller of Two
challenges.description: Given two integers, print the smaller value.

challenges.title: Sign of a Number
challenges.description: For the given integer X print 1 if it's positive, -1 if it's negative or 0 if it's zero.

challenges.title: Smallest of Three
challenges.description: Given three integers, print the smallest value.
challenges.outputDescription: One integer: smallest of the three.
